description:
build: get rid of deps.bash

It doesn't work anymore and it's not used.

messages.text:
LGTM

On Sun, Feb 12, 2012 at 12:20 PM, Mikio Hara <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:

> src/pkg/Make.deps too?

ah, i't's already removed.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Mikio Hara <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> once said:
> src/pkg/Make.deps too?

That was removed in late 2009:

changeset:   4154:35f71b12a3bc
user:        Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
date:        Thu Nov 19 16:27:13 2009 -0800
files:       .hgignore doc/contribute.html src/make.bash src/pkg/Make.deps
description:
build Make.deps during make.bash instead
of keeping a checked-in copy.  doesn't
slow down make.bash appreciably.

R=r
http://codereview.appspot.com/156099

Cheers,
  Anthony

*** Submitted as 5d4cd2971008 ***

build: get rid of deps.bash

It doesn't work anymore and it's not used.

R=golang-dev, mikioh.mikioh
CC=golang-dev
